0.title: The Pound
text: Your life started out rough a stray dog born in the city
but at least you have your best friend Carlo another stray,
OOO would you look at the time its lunch, Where should we eat?

choices.text: Beg for food at the park

1.title: Olive Garden Dumpster
text: You look at Carlo and decided just because we're not pure breed
doesn't mean we don't deserve a fancy meal every now and them.
In the middle on grubbing on some half eaten steak the dog catcher races around the corner and managed to get carlo

2.title: Flee
text: Whewww you got away but was it worth the price,
you spend the rest of your doggo years wondering what happened to Carlo

3.title: No Dog Left Behind!
text: You lunge at the Dog Catcher you're not letting him take Carlo with out a fight,
but its use now you're also trapped. Carlo thanks you for sticking by him and your both on the way to the pound.
you get put into separate cages tension are high every one wont stop BARKING

4.title: Join the Chaos
text: Mob Mentality sets in you decide to join the chaos and before it your the loudest dog in there,
Visitors pass you by seems like there is no adoption in your near future

5.title: Keep calm but alert
text: You decide to not get caught up in the drama but your no fool
you keep your eyes open for potential threats after all its hard out here for a pimp,
to your surprise a young boy approaches you he finally convinces his dad to take you out to meet each other

6.title: Be Friendly
text: Hey this boy isn't to bad and he found your favorite spot to be scratched right behind your left ear,
before you know it you and the boy are playing and all of sudden Carlo walks in
the dad found out you were brought in with a friend he decides to adopt you both CONGRATS YOU FOUND YOUR FOREVER HOME!

7.title: Im no HOUSE DOG!!!
text: You Lunge at the boy before the dad can ask the handler to meet you,
all the visitors turn to look in fear, looks like adoption is not in your near future

8.title: Beg for food at the park
text: You and Carlo decides its a nice day and nice day equal a lot of picnics at the park,
sadly no one wants to spare some food you keep at it for about an hour then people start complaining.
All of sudden you see the dog catcher van pull up.
You and carlo make a run for it but Carlo being a few years older falls behind and gets caught.
